item.title: Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @rossy319 rossy319
item.description:
@rossy319 wrote:

Hey well i’ve downloaded a source and client, i’ve upadated a cache and it’s downloaded because the original wasn’t working.

Although in the client i get this same error every time it gets stuck on connected to update server

“error_game_js5connect” can someone please explain to me how to fix this.
Also here is the clientsettings.java

import java.awt.Color;

public class ClientSettings {

public static String getCacheDir() {
	return System.getProperty("user.home") + "/.rspsCache2"; //only change this if you edit cache
}
public static final String cacheLink = "http://dl.dropbox.com/u/67318387/.rspsCache2.zip"; //make sure it zip
public static final int cacheRevision = 4; //change this if you edit cache


public static final String ip = "127.0.0.1";
public static final int port = 43594;
public static final String background_music_name = "Scape Original"; //rs classic music <3
public static final String serverName = "Project DungeonFest"; //server name, also auto changes client title and load bar
public static final String websiteLink = "http://alex.rspscoding.org"; //so it goes ur website instead of rs, example on acc creation terms service button
public static final Color startLoadClientBackgroundColor = Color.black; //Color.black default
public static final boolean disable_server_list = false; //dont disable this :D, ofc you may but then serverlist doesnt work anymore
public static final boolean disable_ukeys_check = true; //containers table information check but ppl give weird names for stuff as: "ukeys"
public static final boolean disable_keys_request = true; //if this true, disable_ukeys_check has to be true too, when this true, you can load client without connecting server

/*
 * WEBCLIENT
 */
//for webclient all you have to do is jar and sign
//I RECOMMENT YOU TO USE JARMAKER APP FOR THAT http://download.cnet.com/JAR-Maker/3000-2213_4-10588876.html
//main-class: client
//applet-class:client too

/*
 * dont worry even trying hacking, this user is limited :)
 */
public static final String server_list_database = "173.236.35.162:3306/tkoscap1_alex"; //ip, database
public static final String server_list_user = "tkoscap1_alex2"; //user
public static final String server_list_pass = "lol"; //pass

}
